title: Tureen and cover
description: Elliptical with scalloped rim. a) has concave sides, four feet faced with decoration in two shades of green, two handles in form of leopards. b) pinched at four points along rim, high at center, with grip of two crossed fish, rocks, seaweed, and a shell. Chinoiserie decoration in the style of Pillement, in red, yellow, blue, green, and aubergine on white ground. On either side of a) a pair of male figures in open landscape of trees and architecture; flanking each handle, a bird on a bough. b) displays scenes of men and boys looking at a peep-show and practicing archery; a pine tree with serpentine trunk ornaments each end.
name: Tureen and cover
